name: BWM-XMD
description: Best whatsapp bot developed by Ibrahim adams

PREFIX.description: choose your prefix for your bot

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTILINK_GROUP.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto delete links and remove link senders

MENUTYPE.description: Enter 1 for small thumbnail menu, Enter 2 for big thumbnail menu, leave blank and they will be displaying randomly big or Small

AUDIO_CHATBOT.description: Enter yes for your bot to audio chat to messages when offline

AUTO_SAVE_CONTACTS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto save numbers

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react status

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

CHATBOT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reply message when offline

AUTO_BIO.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto bio or no to decline

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your status will be reading automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: You status will be sending status to your inbox automatically (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact  will be reading messages automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mod

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Insert your heroku api-key copy it from your heroku account settings

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Insert your heroku APP NAME enter same as the app name exactly, the fast name up there

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Enter here the number that is hosting the bot Eg, 254xxxxxxx

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you received from from ibrahim adams site

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTIDELETE_MESSAGES.description: Deleted messages will be sent to your inbox, enter yes to enable else put no
